entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
